reviewText: If you prefer the pan and scan format most of these will fill the bill .I have most of these titals already but not in one package. I was hoping to make my collection more compact and add a few titals when I ordered this. Killer shrews, attack of the giant leaches and wasp woman Were titals I have in widescreen on separate boxsets in wide screen but not in this boxset only wasp woman seems to be widescreen in this boxset. most of these are old b&w movies except for Beowulf and seed people.
